DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study was to evaluate visual outcomes, contrast sensitivity, glare and induced high order aberrations induced by the new CustomVue software use for wavefront-guided LASIK.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Outcomes Following LASIK Surgery Using CustomVue
DOC.criteria: Myopia 0.00 to 6.00 D Astigmatism 0.00 up to 3.00 D Manifest refraction spherical equivalent (MRSE) up to 6.00 D. History of ocular pathology Previous ocular surgery Large pupils (greater than 8mm diameter, infrared measurement) Thin corneas (preoperatively calculated minimal residual bed < 250 um) Irregular astigmatism Asymmetric astigmatism Unstable refraction Any other condition that precludes the patient from undergoing LASIK
